trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> column that hosts <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref> controls in its cells.
trans-unit.target: 表示<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>列，该列承载<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref>中其单元格的控件。

trans-unit.source: Use DataGridCheckBoxColumn to display columns of Boolean data as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DataGridCheckBoxColumn，作为一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>显示的布尔型数据列

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of DataGridCheckBoxColumn.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示 DataGridCheckBoxColumn 的示例。

trans-unit.source: ![A DataGridCheckBox column](~/add/media/wpf-datagrid-checkbox.png "A DataGridCheckBox column") To populate the column, bind the column to the data by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ![一个 DataGridCheckBox 列](~/add/media/wpf-datagrid-checkbox.png "DataGridCheckBox 列")来填充列，将列绑定到数据使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A> property is applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> element created in the column.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A>属性应用于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>列中创建的元素。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> for the element in each cell is the data item for the row the cell is in.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>对于每个单元中的元素为该单元格的行的数据项目是英寸</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, to set up the binding you only have to set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，若要将绑定设置你只需设置<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Optionally, you can specify a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> if your data source and target are different types.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以指定<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>如果你的数据源和目标是不同的类型。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about data binding, see [Data Binding (WPF)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定 (WPF)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the DataGridCheckBoxColumn by setting properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn.IsThreeState%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置属性，如自定义 DataGridCheckBoxColumn <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Width%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn.IsThreeState%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn.IsThreeState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to display other types of data, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> provides the following column types: |Column Type|Data Display| |-----------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn>|Use to display URI data.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn>|Use to display enumeration data.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>|Use to display text.| If you want to use other controls in your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>, you can create your own column types by using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要显示其他类型的数据，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>提供下列类型: |列类型 |数据显示 | |-----------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn>|用于显示 URI 数据。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn>|用于显示枚举数据。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn>|用于显示文本。 | 如果你想要使用其他控件与你的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>，你可以创建你自己的列类型，通过使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTemplateColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridTextColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHyperlinkColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.EditingElementStyle*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取的默认值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.EditingElementStyle*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.EditingElementStyle*>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the style.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，表示样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.ElementStyle*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取的默认值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.ElementStyle*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.ElementStyle*>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the style.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，表示样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref> control that is bound to the column's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*> property value.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref>控件绑定到列的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*>属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*>

trans-unit.source: The cell that will contain the generated element.
trans-unit.target: 单元格将包含所生成的元素。

trans-unit.source: The data item represented by the row that contains the intended cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含目标单元格的行项所表示的数据。

trans-unit.source: A new check box control that is bound to the column's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*> property value.
trans-unit.target: 新的复选框控件绑定到列的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*>属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref> control that is bound to the column's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*> property value.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个只读的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref>控件绑定到列的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*>属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*>

trans-unit.source: The cell that will contain the generated element.
trans-unit.target: 单元格将包含所生成的元素。

trans-unit.source: The data item represented by the row that contains the intended cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含目标单元格的行项所表示的数据。

trans-unit.source: A new, read-only check box control that is bound to the column's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*> property value.
trans-unit.target: 新的、 只读复选框控件绑定到列的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*>属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the hosted <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref> controls enable three states or two.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将托管<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox"></xref>控件启用三种状态或两个。

trans-unit.source: The IsThreeState property lets you use a nullable Boolean as the data type and has the same functionality as the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsThreeState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>.
trans-unit.target: IsThreeState 属性，允许您使用可以为 null 的布尔值，因为数据类型，并具有与<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsThreeState%2A?displayProperty=fullName><xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>属性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsThreeState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>相同的功能

trans-unit.source: The three states for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> control are `true`, `false`, and `null`.
trans-unit.target: 三个状态为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>控件`true`， `false`，和`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ToggleButton.IsChecked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosted controls support three states; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if they support two states.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果对托管的控件支持三种状态;，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>确定他们是否支持两种状态。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn.IsThreeState*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn.IsThreeState*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn.IsThreeState*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Called when a cell in the column enters editing mode.
trans-unit.target: 当列中的单元格进入编辑模式时调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> control calls the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.PrepareCellForEdit%2A> method when a cell in a column derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> enters editing mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>控制调用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.PrepareCellForEdit%2A>方法时列中的单元派生自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>进入编辑模式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.PrepareCellForEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn> class overrides this method to respond immediately to the user gesture by updating the value in the hosted <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn>类重写此方法以立即响应用户手势通过更新中所承载的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: This immediate response is necessary because a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn> cell enters edit mode with the same user gesture that changes the state of its hosted <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此即时响应是必需的因为的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn>单元格进入编辑模式与同一用户笔势，更改其托管<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>的状态</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCheckBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: The element that the column displays for a cell in editing mode.
trans-unit.target: 在编辑模式下的单元格显示列的元素。

trans-unit.source: Information about the user gesture that is causing a cell to enter editing mode.
trans-unit.target: 有关导致单元格以进入编辑模式的用户笔势的信息。

trans-unit.source: The unedited value.
trans-unit.target: 未编辑的值。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the contents of a cell in the column in response to a column property value change.
trans-unit.target: 刷新中的列中的列属性值更改单元格的内容。

trans-unit.source: The cell to update.
trans-unit.target: 要更新的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The name of the column property that has changed.
trans-unit.target: 已更改的列属性的名称。
